text.data-name: “But but but.. aren’t you afraid of going to new places ?” asked Inara. “Aren’t you worried about what would happen?” “Yes I am,

svg.text: “But but but.. aren’t you afraid of going to new places ?” asked Inara.“Aren’t you worried about what would happen?”“Yes I am, “ said the stone. But I know how to take worries from my worry-knot Make them disappear, and then I worry-NOT

text.data-name: “What is the trick? “ asked Inara, curious. The stone explained: Take a deep breath, is the first thing I do Close my eyes, th

svg.text: “What is the trick? “ asked Inara, curious.The stone explained: Take a deep breath, is the first thing I doClose my eyes, then take another few Then I speak out my worries, one by oneI say them out loud, until I’m done As they are out and hanging in the airI reach out and grab them, yes, I DARE!
